body: @CrysatlVulpine hit the nail on the head. I checked out Voat when it first launched but quickly determined that the community wasn't one I really wanted to participate in due to the extreme levels of toxicity and racism EVERYWHERE on the site. body:
>Voat claims to be for free speech but it really isn’t.
 
You’re completely insane. You have no idea what these words mean.

>you're not allowed to post anything or even vote and send PMs without an absurd amount of karma.

The only thing you can’t do without 100 karma is downvote. That’s because paid shills would just create bot farms otherwise. You know, like they do on Reddit.

>You don't even get ratelimits, so if you're not part of the hivemind you can't participate.

You’re totally nuts. Five minutes on Voat would prove you wrong.

>it's definitely not the culture

lol, literally knows nothing about Voat
body_html:
Voat claims to be for free speech but it really isn’t.

You’re completely insane. You have no idea what these words mean.

you're not allowed to post anything or even vote and send PMs without an absurd amount of karma.

The only thing you can’t do without 100 karma is downvote. That’s because paid shills would just create bot farms otherwise. You know, like they do on Reddit.

You don't even get ratelimits, so if you're not part of the hivemind you can't participate.

You’re totally nuts. Five minutes on Voat would prove you wrong.

it's definitely not the culture

lol, literally knows nothing about Voat

post.body: I love that there's another reddit alternative but why this over https://voat.co/ ?
post.body_html: I love that there's another reddit alternative but why this over https://voat.co/ ?
post.title: Why this over VOAT?

body:
Voat, like the chans, has a way of dealing with redditors. They’ve tried to migrate to Voat on numerous occasions, and get tossed out every time. Voat has too much free speech for redditors. Voaters refer to this as the Voat immune system.

TLDR they’ve tried failed so many times, that they don’t bother anymore.
body_html:
Voat, like the chans, has a way of dealing with redditors. They’ve tried to migrate to Voat on numerous occasions, and get tossed out every time. Voat has too much free speech for redditors. Voaters refer to this as the Voat immune system.

TLDR they’ve tried failed so many times, that they don’t bother anymore.

post.body: I love that there's another reddit alternative but why this over https://voat.co/ ?
post.body_html: I love that there's another reddit alternative but why this over https://voat.co/ ?
post.title: Why this over VOAT?

body:
This place is by design supposed to accommodate everyone and anyone and promotes discussion, debate and freedom of speech. Without being a place for legitimate hateful discussion.

It also allows intellectual discussion of sensitive topics that would otherwise be shutdown and called all sorts of slurs by other sites.

What it also does well, is refuse to be an echo chamber. You won't find any cancel culture here, it's a fair and even playing field for everyone.

Sites like voat are unfortunately echo chambers that purely exist to be an opposite of the other side.
body_html:

It also allows intellectual discussion of sensitive topics that would otherwise be shutdown and called all sorts of slurs by other sites.

What it also does well, is refuse to be an echo chamber. You won't find any cancel culture here, it's a fair and even playing field for everyone.

Sites like voat are unfortunately echo chambers that purely exist to be an opposite of the other side.

post.title: Why this over VOAT?

body:
Truth is not relative. Truth is not a matter of opinion. Truth does not care about your feelings. Truth exists outside of an individual’s experiences or societal norms. A lie doesn’t become truth, wrong doesn’t become right, and evil doesn’t become good simply because it is accepted by a majority.

Anyone who can’t accept this runs away from Voat screaming in terror that their brainwashing is being questioned. It’s a self-sterilizing system. Stand for truth and you’ll have no problem. Otherwise why would anyone want to deal with you at all?
body_html:

Anyone who can’t accept this runs away from Voat screaming in terror that their brainwashing is being questioned. It’s a self-sterilizing system. Stand for truth and you’ll have no problem. Otherwise why would anyone want to deal with you at all?

post.title: Why this over VOAT?

body:
Sure, I'll bite.

Do you have an actual argument or is typing like you're brain dead the best you can do? I'm not sure what brainwashing you think I'm suffering from, but if finding a site that is largely devoted to hating and belittling wide swaths of humanity just because of an accident of their birth (race, skin color, etc) toxic is brainwashing, then I guess sign me up to drink the whole bowl of kool-aid.

I strongly believe in judging and treating individuals on the basis of their actions and character rather than on the color of their skin or some other random piece of trivia outside their control. I don't care one whit if you're white, black, purple or translucent, if you treat me with respect, then we'll get along fine and I'll return the courtesy. If you want to act the fool and treat me with disrespect, then I have no patience for you.

I have no idea what your idea of objective reality is or what you imagine my "feelings" to be, but hatred and bigotry is something I have no interest in entertaining, whether it's coming from the far right side of the political spectrum or the far left side.
body_html:
Sure, I'll bite.

Do you have an actual argument or is typing like you're brain dead the best you can do? I'm not sure what brainwashing you think I'm suffering from, but if finding a site that is largely devoted to hating and belittling wide swaths of humanity just because of an accident of their birth (race, skin color, etc) toxic is brainwashing, then I guess sign me up to drink the whole bowl of kool-aid.

I strongly believe in judging and treating individuals on the basis of their actions and character rather than on the color of their skin or some other random piece of trivia outside their control. I don't care one whit if you're white, black, purple or translucent, if you treat me with respect, then we'll get along fine and I'll return the courtesy. If you want to act the fool and treat me with disrespect, then I have no patience for you.

I have no idea what your idea of objective reality is or what you imagine my "feelings" to be, but hatred and bigotry is something I have no interest in entertaining, whether it's coming from the far right side of the political spectrum or the far left side.

For being ’other’. Hatred for other reasons, though? Perfectly fine. To have love, you must have hate.

body:
>Sure, I'll bite.

I’m not sure you know who’s getting bitten.

>Do you have an actual argument

That’s literally my line. You’ve yet to have a single refutation to anything that has been said. You can’t even *articulate* your own claims. You sure as shit can’t *substantiate* them, much less refute anyone else’s. We’ll see, but I’ve been through this sort of thing before.

>I'm not sure what brainwashing you think I'm suffering from

Communist. It’s textbook marxist dialectic.

>but if finding a site that is largely devoted to hating

Let’s prod the bubble a bit. **Explain why hate is bad.**

> “The first reaction to truth is hatred.” **~ Quintus Septimius Florens Tertullianus**

Hate is your soul’s immune system. You hate things that are bad for you. Intrinsically. Subconsciously. Genetically. To say otherwise is to claim that hedonistic self-destruction is the “natural state” of life, which is of course obviously false. Love for our own people and wanting to protect and preserve them does not mean hatred of others. Loving your own race is the least racist thing you could do.

>and belittling wide swaths of humanity just because of an accident of their birth

Already taken that point apart.

>(race, skin color, etc)

Ooh, what’s the etc? 

>then I guess

See, you don’t even know *what* you hate so much. You have no idea what you’re fighting against.

>I strongly believe in judging and treating individuals on the basis of their actions and character

Okay. *They don’t.* Your idealism doesn’t jive with the real world. That conflict causes genocide. Always has, always will. Why should the conflict be allowed to exist?

>if you treat me with respect

And if they don’t? What will you do? Anything whatsoever? Will you defend yourself? No. That’s racist to you, and racism is bad, to you. Will you separate yourself? No. That’s racist to you, and racism is bad, to you. **So you will die.** Refusal to defend yourself is acquiescence to your own destruction, and it’s coming damn fast. Your masters can’t help but cheer it on.

>I have no idea what your idea of objective reality is

Nor *can* you, fundamentally, understand what it is, since you have no idea what *objectivity* is.

>but hatred and bigotry is something I have no interest in entertaining

So you hate hatred? How bigoted of you. 

Again, **you’ve masterfully evaded actually stating a single aspect of your worldview**. You do this (perhaps subconsciously) because you know that it’s all bullshit. It’s literally all *indefensible*, intangible, *nebulous* bullshit that you probably can’t even quantify to yourself, much less to others. Moreover, because you know it’s bullshit, you’re terrified of having it *challenged*. As such, you’ll do ANYTHING to prevent it from being destroyed in such a way that you can’t ignore its destruction. **I’m going to ask you to do something specific now.** I’m going to ask you to [refute this](https://ruqqus.com/post/s3r/afraid-to-say-this-on-reddit/1um9). If I’m wrong, you can prove it. I want *quantification*. Specific points, cited and sourced, where and why I’m wrong.

parent.body:
Sure, I'll bite.

Do you have an actual argument or is typing like you're brain dead the best you can do? I'm not sure what brainwashing you think I'm suffering from, but if finding a site that is largely devoted to hating and belittling wide swaths of humanity just because of an accident of their birth (race, skin color, etc) toxic is brainwashing, then I guess sign me up to drink the whole bowl of kool-aid.

I strongly believe in judging and treating individuals on the basis of their actions and character rather than on the color of their skin or some other random piece of trivia outside their control. I don't care one whit if you're white, black, purple or translucent, if you treat me with respect, then we'll get along fine and I'll return the courtesy. If you want to act the fool and treat me with disrespect, then I have no patience for you.

I have no idea what your idea of objective reality is or what you imagine my "feelings" to be, but hatred and bigotry is something I have no interest in entertaining, whether it's coming from the far right side of the political spectrum or the far left side.

I don't care one whit if you're white, black, purple or translucent, if you treat me with respect, then we'll get along fine and I'll return the courtesy. If you want to act the fool and treat me with disrespect, then I have no patience for you.

I have no idea what your idea of objective reality is or what you imagine my "feelings" to be, but hatred and bigotry is something I have no interest in entertaining, whether it's coming from the far right side of the political spectrum or the far left side.
